name: Easy Oniony Cheese Ball
author: BROADSTANTIQUES
summary: This is the easiest, most elegant cheese ball that can be made for snacks or brought to a party at the last minute.  Walnuts coat the outside. Serve with crackers of your choice.
ingredients: 10 ounces extra sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
directions: Thoroughly mix together the softened cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, and onion soup mix in a bowl
Chill in refrigerator for about 1/2 hour to firm up, if necessary
Form the mixture into a ball or log, and press the outside with walnuts
Serve on an appetizer tray or a decorative plate surrounded by assorted crackers
